name: Fulpot Poker - Texas Holdem
description:
Join the BEST multi Poker mobile Game App now!
Fulpot Poker app will share you the best experience of authentic Poker, Texas Hold’em
If you a real gambler playing poker, Fulpot should be THE choice.
Compete against live opponents and fill you pot full of poker chips!

Advanced or Beginner, all players who love to deal and bet, come to right place!
Texas Hold’Em and Omaha, Poker games are all in one platform.

〓〓〓〓〓〓〓〓 Game Features 〓〓〓〓〓〓〓〓


Poker as legend of legend, Texas Holdem

“Poker is a mind sport”

Real Las Vegas poker room is just for one-click
Have a pleasant poker playing experience in Fulpot casino room from high stakes to low stakes poker.
Deal with 2 cards to reach huuuge hand ranking against competitors!

Tip! Find out own betting skills and read opponent’s mind and have a strategic trick, Bluff them!

Another attractive free poker game, Omaha Hold em

“More Chance to win BIG”

Keep your eyes on your hands, there are 4 cards to deal instead two!
Now is your chance to become a real Poker Star! It’s your choice!
Do you want to be a Fulpot Millionaire or Billionaire!?

Real Time Live Championship, Holdem Tournament open every day!

“It’s a Jackpot prize”

Every season in Las Vegas, they are opening the poker tournament, which Fulpot has it DAILY!
World Championship is just in your Hand, wanna be a Poker Star? Practice is needed!
Various Poker Tournaments exist here: SitnGo, Satellites, Free roll tournament, Big Tourney with Large amount of Fulpot guarantee winning prize!
Select your favorite tournament when and wherever you want, the word ‘HERO’ will be your name.

Tip! Fulpot Poker Team Pros, YO HWAN LIM (Boxer), SJ Kim, GD Kim and Eren Lee appear in the Tournament every day at 21 PM (GMT+9) try to defeat them with best poker hands!

Show Time of your emotion

“I can’t suppress this happiness”

Realistic emoticons and quotes for every situation is the only solution to come out your emotion

Socialize your experience

“Nobody can disturb us!”

Keep your privacy playing with your poker friends or social friends
Invite them to the private room without any other players!

Unlimited Bonus Poker Chip

“I can’t stop to play my favorites!”

Friends invitation: Win Bonus Chips
Check-In Daily: Win Mega Bonus Chips
Loosing is not a worriment: Free Refill Chips
Play as much as you can: Stack up Bonus Chips

Authentic Texas Hold’em Poker is CERTIFIED

“Very Trustworthy!”

All cards are randomly dealt to each player,
No bots, only live players are online playing with you!
It just depends on how you deal the cards!

Belong to Fulpot

“Gathering amusement”

Subscription of Fulpot community, you will become a Poker Star faster!
Seasonal Event, poker strategy, tournament information, Free Chips to get!

Link: www.facebook.com/fulpotpoker


We are always appreciated of your Feedback!

- The games are intended for an adult audience.
- The games do not offer "real money gambling" or an opportunity to win real money or prizes.
- Practice or success at social casino gaming does not imply future success at "real money gambling."
